'''Unfinished Reverie''' is an [[Artifact Set]] available at [[:Category:4-Star Artifacts|4-star]] and [[:Category:5-Star Artifacts|5-star]] rarities. It is obtained from [[Faded Theater]].

==Lore==
{{Artifact Lore}}

==Trivia==
* The lore of this Artifact Set relates to [[Natlan]], given mentions of [[Saurian]]s and Natlan's cultural inspirations.
** A {{w|quetzal}} is a type of bird that plays a cultural significance to the {{w|Maya peoples|Maya People}} and the {{w|Aztec People}}, native to the {{w|Mesoamerica|Mesoamerican Region}}.
** Sakkuk is named after the {{w|Maya peoples|Mayan}} queen {{w|Sak K'uk'}}.
** Some figures in the lore have names originating from the real-life figures of the {{w|Inca Empire}}, which incorporated a large portion of western {{w|South America}}:
*** {{w|Yupanqui}} is a name shared by several rulers of the empire, notably its founder {{w|Pachacuti Inca Yupanqui|Pachacuti}} and {{w|Túpac Inca Yupanqui}}. Additionally, the empire's predecessor, the {{w|Kingdom of Cusco}}, also have figures bearing this name, such as {{w|Lloque Yupanqui}}.
*** Atawallpa and Waskar's names are derived from the Quechua names of {{w|Atahualpa}} and {{w|Waskar Inka}}, half-brothers who each laid claim to the throne of the Inca Empire after their father's death. The ensuing succession crisis led to the {{w|Inca Civil War}}.
** Hero twins, in this case Atalwallpa and Waskar, are a {{w|Hero Twins in Native American culture|prominent motif in Native American cultures}}.
